attributes.action: pass a law which makes it illegal to change the Identity of anyone committed of a seroius crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not fair that someone convicted of a seroius crime is "rewarded" with a new identity, new house, poice protection etc.
THEY are the offenders NOT the general public - no way should the taxpayer get the bill.
PLUS if the offender knows there is no chance of a new identity, it MAY have a deterrent effect on some

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
